attributes.action: Easing Covid restrictions for international travel for fully vaccinated people.
attributes.additional_details: The government to get into account the huge negative impact on the mental health and wellbeing of all the people, and especially in the situation of still restricted and limited access to health and dental care. After easing some of the restrictions lots of people still found it impossible to visit their relatives abroad. The promised vaccination freedom. Not clear messages and statistics data and large sources and media. Trespassing human rights of a large group of people. Unfairness and inequalities in the fact that lots of people can't afford to pay and stay isolated.
attributes.background: Canceling asymptomatic testing and quarantine for vaccinated people. Reviewing international travel restrictions and updating the travel lists. Genuine explanation of the vaccine's efficacy, and statistic data.
